exam.question: What exactly is cloud?
choices: Cloud is delivery of computing services including servers, storage, DB, Networking and other services on internet
Cloud computing is delivery of computing services over the internet from single server
Cloud is delivery of computing services on internet for multiple clients.

exam.question: In cloud the billing Model
choices: Fixed price over the billing term
Client has an option to choose Fix Price as well as Flexible Price Models

exam.question: Cloud computing Allows
choices: Scaling of resources as per requirement

exam.question: Deployment/Activation of Cloud Computing
choices: Takes minimum 4 - 6 hours from time of order

exam.question: Select the characteristics of Cloud Computing
choices: Instant Deployment, On Demand Self Servicing, Resource Pooling,  Elasticity
Shared Resources, Third Party Monitoring, AutoBackups, Predefined Billing
Non Shared Computing Resources, Error Free Activation, Single resource Pooling, No Activation

exam.question: In IaaS following component are managed by Service Provider
choices: Application, Data, Runtime, Middleware, OS, Virtualization, Networking

exam.question: In SaaS following component are managed by Service Provider
choices: Application, Data, Runtime, Middleware, OS, Virtualization, Networking, Servers, Storage
Application, Data, Runtime, Middleware, OS, Networking
Virtualization, Servers, Storage, Networking, Networking, OS

exam.question: Following are examples of Public Cloud
choices: Amazon, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, AliCloud, IndSoft
Salesforce, Google Suite, SOHO, Sales Force

exam.question: What Pay-as-you-go cloud computing?
choices: Pay-as-you-go cloud computing (PAYG cloud computing) is a payment method for cloud computing that charges based on usage.
Payment as soon as you start cloud service
Similar to the Prepaid billing system.

exam.question: With Cloud Implementation you can achieve
choices: Cost Increase, Delay in Execution, Time Lapse

exam.question: What is the most popular payment method in cloud computing?
Disadvantages of Cloud Computing
choices: Need to buy all Software Licenses
